name: Little Nose Fight
description:
Challenge your friends or the AI in this intense and nosy versus fighting game!

  • Throw boogers mercilessly at your enemies!
  • 8 arenas of varying difficulty!
  • Secrets to uncover!

Controls :

Controller
XboxKeyboard P1Keyboard P2Pause menu
StartEnter-AimLeft Stick
ArrowsSFEDShoot/FlyACTabPunch/ShieldX or B
XQ
